description: This file contains utility functions for exporting DOM elements or selector-based content as multi-page PDF documents. It uses html2canvas and jsPDF libraries to capture and generate PDFs, supporting additional features like multi-page handling, CORS, and different export options.

methods.name: exportElementToPdf(element, filename = 'page-export.pdf', options = {})
methods.description: Captures a DOM element into a multi-page PDF using html2canvas and jsPDF. Supports returning blob, data URL, or saving directly. Handles multi-page content and dynamic library imports.

methods.name: exportSelectorToPdf(selector, filename = 'page-export.pdf', options = {})
methods.description: Finds an element by CSS selector and exports it as a PDF by invoking exportElementToPdf.
